property.name: functionInstalledSql
property.value: select count(*) from rdb$functions where rdb$function_name = upper('$(functionName)')

entry.value: declare external function $(functionName) cstring(32660) returns cstring(32660) free_it entry_point 'sym_escape' module_name 'sym_udf'
declare external function $(functionName) blob returns cstring(32660) free_it entry_point 'sym_hex' module_name 'sym_udf'

property.name: stringColumnTemplate
property.value: case when $(tableAlias).$(columnName) is null then '' else '"' || $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_escape(substring($(tableAlias).$(columnName) from 1)) || '"' end

property.name: clobColumnTemplate
property.value: case when $(tableAlias).$(columnName) is null then '' else '"' || $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_escape(substring($(tableAlias).$(columnName) from 1)) || '"' end

property.name: blobColumnTemplate
property.value: case when $(tableAlias).$(columnName) is null then '' else '"' || $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_hex($(tableAlias).$(columnName)) || '"' end

property.name: numberColumnTemplate
property.value: case when $(tableAlias).$(columnName) is null then '' else '"' || $(tableAlias).$(columnName) || '"' end

property.value: case when $(tableAlias).$(columnName) is null then '' else '"' || $(tableAlias).$(columnName) || '"' end

entry.value: create trigger $(triggerName) for $(schemaName)$(tableName) after insert as declare variable id bigint; begin if ($(syncOnInsertCondition) and $(syncOnIncomingBatchCondition)) then begin select gen_id($(defaultSchema)gen_$(prefixName)_data_data_id, 1) from rdb$database into :id; insert into $(defaultSchema)$(prefixName)_data (data_id, table_name, event_type, trigger_hist_id, row_data, channel_id, transaction_id, source_node_id, external_data, create_time) values( :id, '$(targetTableName)', 'I', $(triggerHistoryId), $(columns), '$(channelName)', $(txIdExpression), rdb$get_context('USER_SESSION', 'sync_node_disabled'), $(externalSelect), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ); end end

create trigger $(triggerName) for $(schemaName)$(tableName) after update as declare variable id bigint; begin if ($(syncOnUpdateCondition) and $(syncOnIncomingBatchCondition)) then begin select gen_id($(defaultSchema)gen_$(prefixName)_data_data_id, 1) from rdb$database into :id; insert into $(defaultSchema)$(prefixName)_data (data_id, table_name, event_type, trigger_hist_id, pk_data, row_data, old_data, channel_id, transaction_id, source_node_id, external_data, create_time) values( :id, '$(targetTableName)', 'U', $(triggerHistoryId), $(oldKeys), $(columns), $(oldColumns), '$(channelName)', $(txIdExpression), rdb$get_context('USER_SESSION', 'sync_node_disabled'), $(externalSelect), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ); end end

create trigger $(triggerName) for $(schemaName)$(tableName) after delete as declare variable id bigint; begin if ($(syncOnDeleteCondition) and $(syncOnIncomingBatchCondition)) then begin select gen_id($(defaultSchema)gen_$(prefixName)_data_data_id, 1) from rdb$database into :id; insert into $(defaultSchema)$(prefixName)_data (data_id, table_name, event_type, trigger_hist_id, pk_data, old_data, channel_id, transaction_id, source_node_id, external_data, create_time) values( :id, '$(targetTableName)', 'D', $(triggerHistoryId), $(oldKeys), $(oldColumns), '$(channelName)', $(txIdExpression), rdb$get_context('USER_SESSION', 'sync_node_disabled'), $(externalSelect), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ); end end
